EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr. Mrs. {!Qualification__c.Related_Contact__c}, DuPont has established a Nomex® brand Filtration Quality Partner Program and would like your company to participate. The Program is a network of Felters and Bag makers in Europe to increase the confidence of end-users in the quality and adequacy of Nomex® Products through quality criteria for both the participants and products, and testing of the products.
If you agree with the terms of this letter and the attached agreement, DuPont will appoint you as a non-exclusive Bag Maker/Felt Manufacturer under the Program, which will operate as follows:
DUPONT’S SUPPORT As a member of the Program, DuPont will provide to you the support as described in Exhibit G of the attached Trademark License Agreement (TMLA).
YOUR COMMITMENTS In order to continue as a member of the Program, you will need to undertake the following:
Demonstrate the criteria for Bag Makers/Felt Manufacturers as described in Exhibit F of the TMLA and provide the support as outlined in Exibit G. Review the attached TMLA and verify the LICENSEE contact information on page 4 of the agreement; Print out 2 copies,
Verify the"Territory "section of Exhibit A (page 8), listing all the specific countries in Europe Middle east and Africa, where you want to market your products . We would ask you to keep us informed of any change in that list, so we could amend this document. Complete Exhibit E, called “Insurance” (page 13) and Sign & date the agreements on page 7; The completed and signed original contracts can then be sent by post to our Geneva office, as per the below address details: Du Pont International Operations Sàrl Mrs. Cathy Pantet Chemin du Pavillon 2 - PO Box 50 CH-1218 Le Grand-Saconnex / Geneva SWITZERLAND
As soon as the contract has been signed by all parties within DuPont, we will return one original agreement to your attention.
We are looking forward to a very successful cooperation between your company and DuPont. In the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us if you should have any further questions.
With best regards,
